pages.title: Cultivation
pages.text: Most crops can be planted on farmland like traditional plants, though some can be planted similarly to vines or bushes. They are often used in Hexalia’s brews, foods, and rituals.

pages.title: Mandrake
pages.text: A twisted root that writhes faintly when pulled from the ground. Found in $(bold)Forests$(). Harvesting without $(l:hexalia:content/armor_wearables#earplugs)Earplugs$(/l) briefly stuns the player with its scream. Used to cook Mandrake Stew, which grants $(thing)Stuffed (45s)$().

pages.title: Sunfire Tomato
pages.text: A bright, golden tomato radiating warmth even in the dark. Found in $(bold)Savannas$(). Used in Spicy Sandwiches to grant $(thing)Speed II (45s)$().

pages.title: Chillberries
pages.text: Icy blue berries that cool the air around them. Found in $(bold)Taigas$(); plant berries to grow more. Used in Chillberry Pie, granting $(thing)Fire Protection II (45s)$().

pages.title: Saltsprout
pages.text: A pale herb with crystal-tipped leaves that sparkle faintly. Found through $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/mutation)Mutation$(/l) or in Herbalist Huts. Crushed into $(l:hexalia:resources/salt#salt)Salt$(/l) for rituals, and eating it causes $(thing)Hunger (30s)$().

pages.title: Galeberries
pages.text: Soft violet berries that hum gently when touched. Created through $(thing)Celestial Infusion$() of Glow Berries. Used in Galeberry Cookies for $(thing)Night Vision (30s)$().

pages.title: Rabbage
pages.text: A leafy crop with a strange vitality—it almost hops when touched. Created by transmuting Wheat Seeds via $(thing)Nature’s Ritual$(). Can be thrown as a weapon that inflicts $(thing)Bleeding (5s)$().
